events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is really inconvenient.
The issue was categorized under Refund after reviewing the customer's complaint about receiving an incorrect product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect item received in the order.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you got the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to expedite the refund?
Sure, I have attached the photo of the received item and here is my order number: 987654321.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund immediately and send a return shipping label for the incorrect product.
Thanks for the quick response and solution, I appreciate your help and will send back the wrong item tomorrow.
The refund has been processed successfully and the return package was confirmed delivered. Please check your account for the refund.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
As no further response was received, we are closing the case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
